His departure creates serious questions over the Prime Minister's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp.`` It's a mark of the man that he would sneak out a statement on a Friday morning on a busy news day.`` Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street- we need to get to the truth. Mr Andy Coulson resigned as editor of the News of the World in 2007 after the paper's former royal editor Clive Goodman and private investigator Glenn Mulcaire were jailed for phone-hacking.
